Name: Sophos XG Firewall
Author: SophosXGFirewall
Description:
The Sophos XG Firewall solution for Microsoft Sentinel enables you to ingest Sophos XG Firewall logs into Microsoft Sentinel. . 
/r /n **Underlying Microsoft Technologies used:**  
 This solution takes a dependency on the following technologies, and some of these dependencies either may be in [Preview](https://azure.microsoft.com/support/legal/preview-supplemental-terms/) state or might result in additional ingestion or operational costs:
   /r /n a. [Agent-based log collection (Syslog)](The Sophos XG Firewall solution for Microsoft Sentinel enables you to ingest Sophos XG Firewall logs into Microsoft Sentinel. )
